haberman.rhizomatics.graphics

Class PathPaint

  • java.lang.Object
    • haberman.rhizomatics.graphics.PathPaint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoiseLine

    public class PathPaint
extends java.lang.Object
    A mini wrapper that holds a Path and Paint for canvas drawings.
